parseHttpEntity

public static java.lang.String parseHttpEntity(HttpEntity entity)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               java.lang.IllegalStateException

Parses an HTTP request into a into a plain String response

Parameters:
entity - HTTP entity to read from and parse
Returns:
String with the HTTP response contents
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If the entity can't be parsed
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If something went really wrong reading from the server
